name: hookman
description: Command line tool for tracking and distributing Githooks for your projects
author: Connor McKelvey

scripts.build: npm run dist:clean && tsc && cp -r lib/_templates dist/lib/_templates
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:fast
scripts.test:ci: npm run build && npm run test:ci:fast
scripts.test:fast: export NODE_ENV=test && mocha --require source-map-support/register --timeout 100000 --harmony --recursive dist/test-utils/initialize.js $(find ./dist/ -type d -name __test__)
scripts.test:debug: npm run build && export NODE_ENV=test && npm run db:migrate && mocha --debug --debug-brk --timeout 20000 --harmony --recursive $(find ./dist/ -type d -name __test__)
